website_summaries.verdict: A pricey speaker that has some great extras and can be part of a multi-room system.
pros: This speaker can connect wirelessly with built-in Chromecast and Spotify connect or via Bluetooth
Can also be used wired with a 3.5 millimeter cable or RCA cord
Produces fantastic quality sound and can connect with other multi-room Marshall speakers to play different songs in each room or play the same song in multiple rooms
cons: While the WiFi connection is great, the Bluetooth connection can have issues

customer_reviews.title: If like me, you bought this for Bluetooth use just ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 millisecond delay over Bluetooth. If like me, you bought this for Bluetooth use just forget it. You wont be able to watch videos or movies paired to this Woburn Multi room speaker. The non Multi room has no audio/video delay.
customer_reviews.author: TNS

customer_reviews.title: Great little package and multi room is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this speaker after being an audiophile for decades downsizing to a condo and not having room for a full on system with separates this speaker is a great compromise. Sound needs to be adjusted with type of music often. Speaker provides a full sound with emphasis on mid to bottom range. The multi room function is what sold me being able to fill multiple rooms with sound perfectly in sync with no lag between. Sometimes there is connectivity issues but nothing that can’t be overcome. Good looking, kind of like a little practice amp.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth works but it has a lag
customer_reviews.text: I waited months or maybe a year for WOBURN to come out. I purchased it from Amazon and it's what I expected or needed. I listen to blues for the most part. This is the loudest and most clear speaker I ever owned. The Bluetooth is functional but it has a lag and you can't watch anything on your TV with WOBURN be as the speaker. I haven't used the Wifi yet after few months owning this speaker ... Didn't see the need. If I ever use the Wifi, I will update this post. I got to give it a 5-Star even with the problem with its Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Device won't update with Google Home. Device only pairs to internet radio. Device is not recognized by any chromecast app. Changing input to bluetooth will not allow changing input unless you do a factory reset. If you are looking for a nice coffee table, this speaker is for you. If you actually want to play music, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: High and Dry

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dirt or sawdust covering it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift to my son, when he took it out of the box, dirt or some substance was covering it. At least a cup poured out and covered the speaker! Very embarrassing!!! Took a towel to get it all off. He says it still works, but it should have not arrived like that!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Jennings Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker very warm natural but well defined sound and can get really loud without sounding distorted. Would be 5 stars but the bluetooth connection is very quirky it's difficult to get this to see enabled devices form time to time.The WiFi connection is outstanding though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Marshall dismissed
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great but I have spent more time in trying to connect the speaker either via bluetooth or wifi. And now, after a year it just wont connect to the wifi. The google home app ,the marshall app and the marshall website are all unhelpful in solving connectivity issues. As a result, it works like just another bluetooth speaker that keeps disconnecting intermittently. Super annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: So rad
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Loud! The bass is perfect. I have the Acton, Stanmore and how the Woburn. This one is by far my favorite. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: James Benton Allen III

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is quality embodied! Amazing clarity of the sound through Airplay, at 16 bit 44.1 HZ. Amplifiers are VERY good! Download TIDAL and enjoy!! I am getting a second one, although my room is on the smaller side.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayil

customer_reviews.title: Not all that
customer_reviews.text: I love the Marshall products but this one has been a nightmare... Sometimes it wants to connect to Bluetooth another time is it doesn’t... The sound quality is good when it’s working... I thought I was Going to get a few more but this one left a bad taste in my mouth
customer_reviews.author: Todd Ellegard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Marshall consistently delivers an amazing sound. Woburn is not an exception. Top speaker
customer_reviews.author: AURA U.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected the bass is weak it really sucks for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok not as loud as I expected really weaken for 700. Dollars
customer_reviews.author: james allen bell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used items from here
customer_reviews.text: Beware of used items that come up in this listing really cheap. They are older models of Woburn that doesn’t support multi-room and WiFi streaming
customer_reviews.author: Elen

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Its sounds better than I expected. If you have to choose between this one or another, choose marshall woburn.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Woburn Multiroom
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds with power, detail and virtually without saturation. It can fill a big big room and even some backyards for an openhouse party without major problems. A bit pricey but overall very good. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Araya

product_meta.title: Marshall Woburn Wireless Multi-Room Bluetooth Speaker, Cream (04091923)
product_meta.description: Color:CreamMarshall Woburn Wireless Multi-Room Bluetooth Speaker, Cream (04091923)
feature_bullets: Easily set up your single or multi-room wireless system in just a few Steps
Connect wirelessly with Chromecast built-in, Spotify connect, airplay or Bluetooth, or go wired with a 3.5mm jack or RCA cord
Seven one-touch presets. This speaker gives you immediate access to artists, Albums and playlists on Spotify or internet radio stations
Using multiple Marshall multi-room speakers you can wirelessly play different songs in each room or bring it all together and play the same song throughout the entire home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars55 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #8,201 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#59,389 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
